creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: indigo-dyed cloth with textured looking background made up of lighter and darker indigo circular shapes; circle designs in dark indigo, with intersecting dotted lines and a smaller circular shape extending from edges in bottom R edge and in center L edge; similar circular shape in top R edge
title: Fragment [from an identical pair]
